title: Mobile Micro Chinese Reading Education for Intermediate Learners Using Visual Word Boundary Marking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese character recognition and ability to interpret simple sentences
context.additional_context: Enhanced reading training using visual word boundary markers (color/spacing) in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, aimed at expanding language proficiency for learners in mathematical vocational fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze sentence structures with over 60% accuracy improvement by utilizing visual word boundary markers (color/spacing).
Learners complete daily 10-minute mobile learning modules with over 90% attendance rate for 4 weeks.
Learners achieve a 30%+ score increase in standardized Mandarin reading comprehension assessments upon completing the 6-month course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
